Library Heat Exchangers¶

A brief library of commercial component designs.

mcycle.library.heat_exchangers.alfaLaval_AC30EQ(flowSense='counterflow', flowInWf=None, flowInSf=None, flowOutWf=None, flowOutSf=None, ambient=None, sizeAttr='NPlate', sizeBracket=[3, 100], sizeUnitsBracket=[1e-05, 10.0], name='HxPlate instance', config=<mcycle.bases.config.Config object>, kwargs={})[source]¶

Alfa Laval AC30EQ brazed plate heat exchanger, http://www.alfalaval.dk/globalassets/documents/products/heat-transfer/plate-heat-exchangers/brazed-plate-heat-exchangers/ac/ac30eq–ach30eq.pdf
